Detailed Description

A manipulator implementation handling execution and control of scenarios.

Member Function Documentation

◆ load_scenario() [1/2]

void cse::scenario_manager::load_scenario ( const boost::filesystem::path &  scenarioFile,
time_point  currentTime 
)

Load a scenario for execution.

Parameters
scenarioFileThe path to a proprietary json file defining the scenario.
currentTimeThe time point at which the scenario will start. The scenario's events will be executed relative to this time point.

Load a scenario for execution.

Parameters
sThe in-memory constructed scenario.
